    symbol={\ensuremath{N}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{InstanceActive}[_{t,i,idx}] \in \math\left{0, 1\right}}},
    description={$1$ iff (if and only if) instance of type $i$ with index $k \in \instanceSet_i$ is launched to process task group $g$, otherwise $0$ (binary)}
}

    symbol={\ensuremath{H}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{InstanceHours}[_{t,i,idx}] \in \mathbb{Z}, \ge 0, \le \glssymbol{workflow_deadline}}},
    description={for how many hours the instance of index $k$ is launched (integer)}
}
\newglossaryentry{InstanceTasks} {
    symbol={\ensuremath{T}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{InstanceTasks}[_{t,i,idx}] \in \mathbb{Z}, \ge 0, \le \glssymbol{task_count}[_{t}]}},
    description={how many tasks of $g$ are processed on that instance (integer)}
}

    symbol={\ensuremath{D}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{LayerDeadline}[_{l}] \in \mathbb{Z}, \ge 1, \le \glssymbol{workflow_deadline}}},
    description={actual computation time for level $l$ (real)}
}

    symbol={\ensuremath{D^t}},
    name={\ensuremath{\glssymbol{LayerTime}[_{l}]  \ge 0, \le \glssymbol{workflow_deadline}}},
    description={maximal number of hours (deadline) that instances are allowed to run at level $l$ (integer)}
}
